direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create responses related to refreshing, but one is for success and the other for error.
Both methods create responses with similar structures, involving attributes like LIFETIME and XOR-MAPPED-ADDRESS.
Both methods involve creating responses that include address attributes, though for different purposes.
Both methods handle error scenarios and create responses with error codes.
Both methods are part of the response creation process in the MessageFactory class, though for different types of requests.
